snippet.title: Across The Obelisk: The Wolf Wars Announcement - Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
Relive the Wolf Wars on March 30th with this new story DLC for Across the Obelisk.

Take control of heroes and their comrades in a retelling of one of the major events in Senenthia and find out more about the happenings of the past. Unlock new cosmetics from the past, and recruit a new hero to your roster, as you uncover the secrets of the past.

Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2325780

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK3, EU4 and HOI4.
